name: The Daily Good 27.2.22
description:
The daily good is all about noticing the beautiful small moments throughout your day.

Like the gorgeousness of sunlight through boiling water.

Capturing those moments brings more joy and satisfaction to a life. 


It's a mindfulness practice to notice the small moments. 
And there are so many of them.

Life is a series of small moments punctuated by large ones.

The small moments are the tapestry of life.
